description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1836.17 dated 15/02/2021 to allow for a change of external material to the porches from the approved render to brick (Construction of five residential units with off-street parking and garages and private amenity space)
decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
* Use of facing brick (to match main dwellings) to porch replacing render finish.

The permission hereby granted does not supersede the previously imposed conditions and particulars approved under ref:  P1836.17 or the details subsequently approved through approval of details reserved through condition.
